It's still quite blurry, quite a few parts missing, but I still felt that American Pie feeling, and most of the movie was there. Just imagine you had an Xtra Large coke in the theatres and had to go to the toilet every time. Makes sense. Will rewatch when better quality upload comes cuz it was a great and surprising film:)
